alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 10 at 4:28AM HST until January 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IS CANCELLED FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .Moderate to large northwest swell (310-320 degree) will maintain advisory level surf heights for north and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, and Oahu through late tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Surf from 12 to 18 feet along north facing shores...8 to 14 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, and Oahu. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 6 AM HST Thursday. For the Coastal Flood Statement, from this evening through early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of beaches that are normally dry, minor coastal erosion, and saltwater inundation. Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous. Submit your coastal flooding photos to the University of Hawaii Sea Grant College Program`s Hawaii and Pacific Islands King Tides Project at: PacificIslandsKingTides.org
info.instruction: Avoid driving through flooded roadways. If you are forced to drive through salt water, be sure to rinse your vehicle with fresh water. Move electronics, vehicles or other valuables to higher ground. Monitor vessels to ensure mooring lines don`t get too tight and watch out for overwash around boat ramps. Secure canoes or other watercraft stowed on beaches. Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
